about_the_game:
The World Series of Poker game is the #1 free-to-play Texas Hold’em poker game in the world!

Live your poker dreams as you play Texas Hold’em poker, Omaha, and tournaments against players from around the globe. Sharpen your poker skills and have tons of fun with exciting poker games and prize-packed mini-games!

Play now and claim your welcome chip stack!

Whether you're a seasoned poker player or just learning the ropes, the WSOP free-to-play online Texas Hold’em poker game has something for everyone:

---

EXCITING POKER GAMES

Tune in for endless hours of fun with a variety of poker games, including classics like Texas Hold’em and Omaha, King of The Table, Rapid Roulette, Executive Duel, Wild Poker, and many more!

---

EXCLUSIVE BEAT THE HOUSE TABLES

Get ready for a poker thrill you can’t find anywhere else! Play Ultimate WSOP, WSOP Caribbean Hold'em, and Trinity poker (3-Card poker), beat the house and win massive stacks!

---

EPIC TOURNAMENTS

The WSOP tournament experience is where real champions thrive! Compete in 3-player Texas Hold’em poker games where only one player will scoop the big prize and all the glory!

---

WSOP COLLECTIBLES

Win Rings and Bracelets like a real WSOP Poker Champion and show them off on your profile for everyone to see—you’ve got game!

---

AWESOME MINI-GAMES

The Lightning Show, Video Poker, Chip Case Bonus, Daily Blitz, and many more exciting, prize-packed mini-games are waiting to blast your bankroll!

---

CRUSHING QUESTS

Put your poker skills to the test with daily Special Quests and Season Quests to win amazing rewards! Join WSOP agent Mary as she leads you through the season on your epic journey to becoming a WSOP superstar, and stack up big prizes along the way!

---

THE SLOT MACHINE

Never a dull moment with the Slot Machine! Spin it between games or even at the tables while waiting for your turn and… Ka-ching! Massive chip prizes may rain down upon you!

---

THE WSOP ALBUM

Collect cards and Legend Chips to fill your album, complete sets, and win amazing rewards all the way to completing the album and claiming the grand prize!

---

PLAY 24/7

Play anytime, anywhere! Join friends at the tables or make new ones. Wind down after a long day or play poker hands while commuting to work. The WSOP game delivers countless hours of nonstop fun!
